title: DragonFruit787
author: DragonFruit787
content: Website:https://excess.ga/Excess.ga, It is a decentralized game running on the WAX Blockchain This game uses a completely random system in the prize based on the RNG smart contractThe game is easy to understandYou can make money with your own luck.I am open to any questions about Excess.ga and WAX Cloud Wallet so please, feel free to postI wish everyone good luck and have funHow to play Excess.ga:https://youtu.be/3ZlkD9pZdrQRead Article:WAX Cloud Wallet (WCW): CPU, NET, RAM Resource Management :https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mRLSL8LlflkWAX RNG - WAX Developer :https://developer.wax.io/en/tutorials/create-wax-rng-smart-contract/rng_basics.html?fbclid=IwAR2TXHyD338UI0jurxXLuZB0MqqLJIHzEV5bf1OtxOdM3-qhtNjt7NTXqOcGitHub - worldwide-asset-exchange/wax-orng: WAX Random Number Generator Native Blockchain Service smart contract :https://github.com/worldwide-asset-exchange/wax-orng?fbclid=IwAR3qFsW_SYKKUhLvp9RyH0lq0R4RwJCzU0pqTyzpx9d_UHhuTce1FnEcvIMQ&AHow to Create a Wax wallet : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6ZPDnfDvzxMHow to Create Anchor Account https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w26Gri3nHpEQ:Why We are using a WAX Blockchain ?A:WAX has no transaction gas(fees).Q:Where can I buy WAX ?A:MoonPay, Binance, Binance US, Crypto.com
